constraints.grammar:
export interface Schema { properties: Record<string, {type: string}>; required?: string[] }
export function validateJSON(data: any, schema: Schema): {valid: boolean, errors: string[]}

variable_patterns: Use descriptive names for schema properties (e.g., 'required', 'type')

must_use: Error array to collect all validation errors
Type checking for: string, number, boolean, object, array
must_not_use: Early return on first error (must collect all errors)
patterns: Check all required fields are present
Return object with valid flag and errors array
Handle nested objects recursively or iteratively

complexity_constraints.time_complexity: O(n) where n is number of fields in data
complexity_constraints.space_complexity: O(e) where e is number of errors
